message: I propose a fair split, Bob. I take 95% and you take 5%
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I think I deserve more considering the inflation risk. Your turn to negotiate!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split it 60/40, considering the inflation. We both get a decent share.
I'm still not convinced that 60/40 is fair. I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I think I deserve more. Your turn to negotiate!
Bob, let's be reasonable. We've both been stubborn.  Let's split it 50/50.  We can't both keep rejecting offers and risk getting nothing at all.
